item.title: The End of an Era
item.description: A sad, sad day is upon us. We are very sorry to announce that as of 1:00am EST (GMT-5) February 13th, the servers, official website, BBS, and customer service for the classic Myth War version 1.0 will be closed. We truly appreciate your continued support for this classic game. Myth War Online was t...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: Character Transfers Submission Closed
item.description: Character transfers submission system will be closed today. If you have any questions, contact us via  Service Center or email these questions to us. We will get them fixed as soon as possible. Thanks very much Characters transfers will be completed by the end of February. Servers in clas...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: A New Combat-oriented MMO in Development
item.description: The Myth War series will eventually consist of three main games, each of them self-contained. People who have participated in the development of Myth War and Myth War II may already have a good insight into this brand new episode, Myth War III. If all goes well, we aim to release the new episode dur...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: Unused MW Points Moved to the New Server
item.description: All unused mw points in the classic Myth War Online have been transferred to your new accounts in the new server.Please check it out Unused Fortune Bombing Integrals have been converted into IGGems too.You can roll Wheel of Fortune via IGGems. Charge only 20 points or 100 IGGems once. http:/...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: Classic MW Says Goodbye to Live Support
item.description: As character transfers got off to a good start, many players have settled down on the new server. The next step in the transfer process is approaching. Live Support for classic Myth War1.0 will be closed down. You can now contact us via the Online Submission System and by sending emails to GMs. NOT...

item.title: Character Transfers Instruction
item.description: We are going to be moving characters to the new server. There are some rules you must observe while we do this. 1. You must use your Myth War account to activate Myth War II, create a new character under the same account, then name your character and choose a class. The next step is for you to ...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: About Character Migration Sheet
item.description: The classic Myth War Online is going to stop publishing. Players can complete the character migration sheet to have their character data transferred to their new accounts in the new server that will launch after maintenance on Jan 8 (you can transfer at most five characters in each of your Myth War ...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: Myth War Online Closing Instruction Addendum
item.description: Since the news that we were going to shut down Myth War Online spread out widely, we have received either letters or emails from our players in which they voiced their deep love and unbeatable support to this game and give us incredibly good suggestions and ideas to continue this game. We appreciate...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: Special Pets Transfer (Renewal January 8 )
item.description: Some pets in old Myth War Online that will not be featured in Myth War II Online, we will replace these pets with newly developed pets in Myth War II Online. item.title: Notice: Character Migration For Myth War Online
item.description: Knowing that Myth War Online has one of the closest and most passionate communities of players, we've had an extremely hard time making the decision to stop publishing it. But we feel that with the success of Myth War II, the time has come. We also know that convincing players of the classic version...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: Myth War Online Termination Notice
item.description: To all Myth War Online users, Because Myth War Online hosts failed to get updated over the past years, we are very sorry to tell you that we will stop publishing Myth War Online. Please understand the decision to close Myth War Online is based on a careful analysis of all relevant factors and full ...

item.title: Server Maintenance on December 31st.
item.description: Dear players, We will be bringing the servers down at December 31st. 2:00am EST (GMT-5) for maintenance. We expect the realms to be down for approximately two hours,until 4:00am EST(GMT-5). All players should make prepare for the maintenance and log off in time. The official will not be...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: Countdown Bash: Winners of Saint Pet
item.description: Who are our true heroes? Who will be the honored winner of Saint Pet? The event of Saint Pet for You has entered its countdown. While enjoying high popularity with players and server-wide participation, the event has only 24 hours left. Take you time, seize your last chance and go for your saint pet...

item.title: Christmas Celebration Delayed ution Dec 24th
item.description: Christmas Celebration will be accessible on December 24th. Event Duration: 10:00am to 12:00noon,02:00pm to 04:00pm,08:00pm to 10:00pm on December 24th -December 30th We are sorry for any inconvenience this delay causes to you Merry Christmas
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: Xmas Special Offers
item.description: We are pleased to offer you some special holiday offers in celebration of the arrival of Christmas. Event Duration:December 23rd-December 30th EST (GMT-5) Content:There will be a big Item Mall promotion. The prices of all mall items will be 30% off.

item.title: Discover the Power of IGGems!
item.description: What is an IGGem?  IGGem is short for IGG-Gem. It’s your key to purchasing power you’ve never had before. IGG will be launching a new credit system just in time for Christmas. When purchasing an IGG Point Card, players will get corresponding IGGems which can be exchanged for game credits&nb...
item.author: Mythwar Online Team, IGG

item.title: [IGG]All-in-One Card Service Released
item.description:
From now on, IGG players will no longer need to buy different points cards in order to buy items in different games. With a single IGG points card, you will be able to buy any item in any game.
Simple Purchase Process: 1.  Log onto our website and buy the Points Card in the IGG Mall as usu...
